definitions.text: information about recent and important events
examples: they awaited news of the outcome

definitions.text: information reported in a newspaper or news magazine
examples: the news of my death was greatly exaggerated

definitions.text: a program devoted to current events, often using interviews and commentary
examples: we watch the 7 o'clock news every night

definitions.text: informal information of any kind that is not previously known to someone
the quality of being sufficiently interesting to be reported in news bulletins
examples: the judge conceded the newsworthiness of the trial
he is no longer news in the fashion world
